text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated, unless the context clearly requires otherwise.

section.section: "Bond" means an obligation for the payment of money, by whatever name known or source of funds secured, issued by a State unit under general or special statutory authority.

text.section: "Enabling act" means a law that authorizes a State unit to create a debt and to sell bonds to evidence that debt.
"Resolution" means a resolution or other evidence of official action customarily used by a State unit.

section.section: "State unit" means a unit or instrumentality of the State.
"State unit" does not include the State.
